courses.name: 서호공원
courses.advice_short_en: Okay to run with some caution ⚠️
courses.advice_detail_ko: 러닝하기 최적의 온도입니다. 평소보다 페이스를 조금 올려도 부담이 적습니다. 약한 바람으로 러닝에 큰 지장은 없습니다. 노면이 건조해서 미끄럼 위험이 적습니다. 공기질이 매우 나쁩니다. 가능하면 실외 러닝 대신 실내 운동이나 휴식을 권장합니다. 추가 주의 요인: 공기질 매우 나쁨. 컨디션에 따라 강도를 조절하고, 평소보다 몸 상태를 더 자주 점검해 주세요.
courses.advice_detail_en: Perfect temperature for running. You can slightly increase your usual pace. Light breeze with little impact on running. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is very poor. Indoor exercise or rest is recommended instead of outdoor running. Extra cautions: Very poor air. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.

courses.advice_detail_en: Perfect temperature for running. You can slightly increase your usual pace. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is very poor. Indoor exercise or rest is recommended instead of outdoor running. Extra cautions: Very poor air. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
